title: Document in Anesthesia Record
description: An anesthesiologist is monitoring a patient during surgery and needs to document events in the electronic anesthesia record.

tasks.description: Verify that real-time data from the patient monitor (e.g., heart rate, SpO2) is flowing correctly into the anesthesia record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Anesthesiologist confirms the interface is working and data is populating automatically.

tasks.description: Manually document the administration of an anesthetic gas and a bolus of medication.
tasks.expected_outcome: Anesthesiologist accurately records the manually administered drugs.

tasks.description: Document a key surgical event, such as 'Incision'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Anesthesiologist timestamps a critical event in the case, which provides context for any physiological changes.
